title: Julian Nagelsmann - Wikipedia
snippet: Nagelsmann ended his tenure at Bayern with a 71.4% win rate, with only Pep Guardiola, Hansi Flick and Carlo Ancelotti averaging more Bundesliga points than him.

title: Julian Nagelsmann: News & coaching profile - FC Bayern Munich
snippet: Julian Nagelsmann was born on 23 July 1987 and has been head coach at Bayern since July 2021. Info, honours and news here.

title: Julian Nagelsmann: 10 things on the coach hoping to lead Germany to FIFA World Cup success | Bundesliga
snippet: Nagelsmann signed a five-year deal at Bayern; that his tenure ended after just 18 months does not mean it should be written off as a failure though. He won the 2021/22 Bundesliga title with three games to spare, and over the course of his time ...

title: Julian Nagelsmann sacked as Bayern Munich head coach with Thomas Tuchel appointed | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Nagelsmann won 60 of his 84 games in charge since taking over in July 2021 but has lifted just one Bundesliga trophy and two German Super Cups across his tenure. Bayern lost 2-1 against Bayer Leverkusen before the international break and host ...

title: Julian Nagelsmann - Coach on the hunt for success
snippet: He took over FC Bayern Munich in 2021 and was appointed national coach in 2023. Despite his rapid rise, Nagelsmann remained down-to-earth and is committed to social projects, particularly in youth soccer.
